Why are gas fees required in Ethereum transactions, and how are they determined?

answers.a: Gas fees are used to purchase Ether; they are fixed for all transactions.
answers.b: Gas fees are required to compensate miners for computation; they vary based on the computational complexity of the transaction.
answers.c: Gas fees are optional and depend on the user's preference
answers.d: Gas fees are waived for transactions involving smart contracts.
